snippet: Michael McFaul, the former United States ambassador to Russia, told the editor of the Russian government’s overseas broadcast network Russia Today, that he refused to keep “pretending that RT is a news organization.”
abstract: Michael McFaul, the former United States ambassador to Russia, told the editor of the Russian government’s overseas broadcast network Russia Today, that he refused to keep “pretending that RT is a news organization.”

headline.main: Former U.S. Ambassador Confronts Russian Network's Editors Over Reporting on Crimea
